description: The amount shown below is the total balance outstanding on your Auto Pay service.

texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["The amount shown below is the total balance outstanding on your Auto Pay service."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
If your Auto Pay service is 'pending suspension' or 'suspended', we will automatically reactivate it after a successful payment. If it is 'closed', you will need to apply for Auto Pay again.
